scripts.build:free-dist: cross-env BUILDTARGET=basic rollup -c && javascript-obfuscator dist/botium-box-server.js --output dist/botium-box-server.js --compact true --self-defending true
scripts.build:premium-dist: cross-env BUILDTARGET=premium rollup -c && javascript-obfuscator dist/botium-box-server.js --output dist/botium-box-server.js --compact true --self-defending true
scripts.publish:free-dist: npm run build:free-dist && mkdir -p ~/botium-box-dist/basic/server/dist/generated && cp -Rf dist database package.json package-lock.json .graphqlconfig.yml ~/botium-box-dist/basic/server && cp src/generated/prisma.graphql ~/botium-box-dist/basic/server/dist/generated && cp src/schema.graphql ~/botium-box-dist/basic/server/dist && cp .env.botium-box-basic-dist ~/botium-box-dist/basic/server/.env
scripts.publish:premium-dist: npm run build:premium-dist && mkdir -p ~/botium-box-dist/premium/server/dist/generated && cp -Rf dist database package.json package-lock.json .graphqlconfig.yml ~/botium-box-dist/premium/server && cp src/generated/prisma.graphql ~/botium-box-dist/premium/server/dist/generated && cp src/schema.graphql ~/botium-box-dist/premium/server/dist && cp .env.production ~/botium-box-dist/premium/server/.env
